airframe.name: FYA
airframe.makefile:
ARCHI=stm32 SRC_FYA=fya
test_blink.ARCHDIR = $(ARCHI) test_blink.TARGET = test_blink test_blink.TARGETDIR = test_blink
test_blink.CFLAGS += -I$(SRC_FYA) test_blink.srcs += $(SRC_FYA)/test_blink.c test_blink.srcs += $(STLIB_SRC)/stm32f10x_gpio.c \ $(STLIB_SRC)/stm32f10x_rcc.c \ $(STCORE_DIR)/system_stm32f10x.c \ $(STCORE_DIR)/core_cm3.c
